ingredients.item: 1 essential Waitrose Cauliflower, broken into florets
150g essential Waitrose Low Fat Greek Style Natural Yogurt
½ x 25g pack curly parsley, finely chopped

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the cauliflower, courgette and onion for 10 minutes, turning frequently. Tip them into a large roasting tin.
Tear the pittas into bitesize pieces and scatter them into the tin with the cumin. Mix well. Bake for 15 minutes until the pitta is toasted.
Combine the yogurt, garlic and parsley with a little seasoning. Spoon the vegetables onto serving plates, drizzle with the yogurt and serve with the almonds scattered over the top.
